issue.title: [C++][Plasma] Plasma Store will crash using small memory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3226](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3226). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Plasma Store will do the eviction when the memory allocation is not enough. When specified a smaller store limit, Plasma Store will crash when limit memory reached.
